activities: Provide services to pharmaceutical, biotech and medical device companies.  Abt Bio-Pharma Solutions (ABS), Inc may colect and process data relating to study participants, study investigators and their staff,medical and healthcare professionals, contractors and consultants, in addition to human resources data. ABS may transfer data between members of the European Union and the United States.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovenia, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
